chapter.title: Selenium, TestNG and TAP
chapter.para: In this final chapter we will guide you through a more detailed and technical path: use TAP in your Selenium test back ended by TestNG. It means you will run TestNG tests that uses Selenium API for funcional Web tests and the output of this process will be TAP.
So it is hammer time! If you are still confused about how to integrate TestNG and TAP, please go back to Chapter 6 to read about it.
